description: This file defines a Navigation singleton object providing navigation helper functions for an Android application, including methods to navigate to Home, Login, and Dietary Preferences fragments, and a method to handle back navigation.

classes.name: Navigation
classes.description: A singleton object that provides static navigation functions to switch between different fragments within the app.

methods.name: toHome
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with HomeFragment, adding the transaction to the back stack.

methods.name: toLogin
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with LoginFragment, adding the transaction to the back stack.

methods.name: toDietaryPreferences
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with DietaryPreferencesFragment, adding the transaction to the back stack.

methods.name: back
methods.description: Triggers the back press to pop the current fragment from the back stack.
